Plotting
=======

Plotting programs are used to generate visual graphics of seismic data. Their parameters are given by a Dictionary (param = Dict()).

SeisPlot
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Generate color, wiggle, or overlay displays of a 2D gather of data.

SeisPlotAmplitudeSpectrum
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Calculates and plots the normalized amplitude spectrum for a collection of traces.

SeisPlotFKSpectrum
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Calculates and plots a frequency wavenumber amplitude spectrum for a 2D gather of data.
